column4: lost, the crappy opera browser crashed my connection to webirc
-bin depends on -data, but both have the same file :(
now i cant upgrade to the newest -bin. i cant even access my pc graphic interface anymore :(
how can i switch to a previous version?
here's the output of my upgrade attempt: http://emyller.net/output
any thoughts? i'm really needing help :|
if you are trying to use kubuntu then you will get better help in  #kubuntu
it's not about kubuntu itself, it's about packaging
anyway, i couldnt get help there
you see, I assumed that special dependencies between KDE packages are better known there than here....
i figured it out. this is why i tried there first then came here :P
its ok with me, but I never used KDE on ubuntu - so no help from me either - sorry
it seems that it'll save my life: http://shreevatsa.wordpress.com/2006/04/16/dpkg-error-trying-to-overwrite-x-which-is-also-in-package-y/
see that it has nothing to do with kde stuff ;)
thank you for reporting back - I'll remember that :-)
